title: MD
biography: Bindu Menon is an Indian neurologist, health activist, researcher and academician from Andhra Pradesh. She is known for providing free treatment to patients with Neurological disorder in rural areas of India through her organization, the Dr. Bindu Menon Foundation. She runs an initiative called Neurology-on-Wheels, offering free healthcare services to remote areas since 2013.
aiSummary: Bindu Menon is a stroke advocacy specialist with an H-index of 22 at Neurology (Member). Has been published in Investigative Ophthalmology & Visual Science, Molecular and Cellular Endocrinology, Nature Reviews Neurology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
